name: Moonlight Soiree
description:
You were tasked with investigating a possible murder at the palace party. Your aim is to talk to the invitees, sort out the suspects and find the culprit with the help of witnesses after a possible murder.

Features List:

  • 100+ different NPC's with random personalities.
  • 10+ classical musics.
  • Random possibilites which will make everything complicated with each play.

Soundtrack List:

  • Blue Danube - Strauss
  • Can-Can - Offenbach
  • Eine Kleine Nachtmusik - Mozart
  • Turkish March - Mozart
  • Habanera - Bizet
  • Les Toreadors from Carmen - Bizet
  • E Minor Prelude - Chopin
  • Funeral March - Chopin
  • Gymnopedie No. 1 - Satie
  • Midsummer's Night Dream - Mendelssohn
  • Symphony No. 5 - Beethoven
  • Fur Elise - Beethoven
  • Moonlight Sonata - Beethoven
